name: @triliumnext/edit-demo
description: Desktop version of Trilium which imports the demo database (presented to new users at start-up) or the user guide and other documentation and saves the modifications for committing.

scripts.docs:edit: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" TRILIUM_DATA_DIR=./data-docs TRILIUM_ENV=dev TRILIUM_INTEGRATION_TEST=memory-no-store TRILIUM_PORT=37741 electron ./src/electron-docs-main.ts .
scripts.docs:edit-nix: electron-rebuild --version 33.3.1 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" TRILIUM_DATA_DIR=./data-docs TRILIUM_PORT=37741 TRILIUM_ENV=dev TRILIUM_INTEGRATION_TEST=memory-no-store nix-shell -p electron_33 --run "electron ./src/electron-docs-main.ts ."
scripts.demo:edit: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" TRILIUM_DATA_DIR=./data-demo TRILIUM_ENV=dev TRILIUM_INTEGRATION_TEST=memory-no-store TRILIUM_PORT=37741 electron ./src/electron-edit-demo.ts .
scripts.demo:edit-nix: electron-rebuild --version 33.3.1 && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" TRILIUM_DATA_DIR=./data-docs TRILIUM_PORT=37741 TRILIUM_ENV=dev TRILIUM_INTEGRATION_TEST=memory-no-store nix-shell -p electron_33 --run "electron ./src/electron-edit-demo.ts ."
